topics.body:
"@PaskaNaakka":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5404df9a6368724159fa0000#post_5404df9a6368724159fa0000
Step 1. Get fat
Step 2. Glue yourself to the nearest computer chair
Step 3. -trilby- fedora
Step 4. Put a bunch of cheetos and Doritos into a food processor and give them a spin
Step 5. Cover your face, hands and arms in the resulting dust. Rub it in hard so that it becomes lodged in your pores. 

After following these instructions your neckbearded should arrive in the mail within the week.
